title: The All-American Quote Machine
about: This site aggregates and presents several curated quotes from notable American presidents, scientists, captains of industry, literary figures, and much more! If you find a quote that you'd like to share, you can share it easily via Twitter.

title: Tic Tac Toe in React!
about: This is the classic game of Tic-Tac-Toe built using the React framework. The game uses a recursive algorithm to play perfectly, but has a chance to blunder a move to give the player a fighting chance!

title: SC2 Stream Tracker
about: Track whether some of the most prolific Starcraft 2 Game Casts are online and visit their streams at the click of your mouse.

title: Pomodoro Clock
about: A pomodoro clock is a very useful tool for effective time managment. This particular interface for such a clock is readable and easy to use.

title: Polynomial Regression Playground
about: This site uses the AI to approximate a polynomial function that conforms to custom, user-generated data. I'd be happy to go into an in depth explanation of how it works during a personal interview.
